description.original: Load plugins with a delay on startup, so that you can get your app startup down into the sub-second loading time.
description.translation: Load plugins with a delay on startup, so that you can get your app startup down into the sub-second loading time.

dict.description: \"Load plugins with a delay: description: "在启动时延迟加载插件，以便将应用程序的启动时间缩短到亚秒级。"
dict..setName(\"Set the delay for all plugins: .setName("一次性设置所有插件的延迟")
dict..setDesc(`Enable this if you want to hav: .setDesc(`如果您希望根据使用的是台式机还是移动设备来设置不同的配置，请启用此选项。以下所有设置都可以在台式机和移动设备上进行不同的配置。您当前使用的是 ${this.lazyPlugin.device} 设置。`)
